snippet: People across China have been detained or questioned in recent days for supporting journalists at a newspaper who have been protesting strict censorship, according to a rights group and online posts.
abstract: Human rights group says people across China have been detained or questioned for supporting journalists at Southern Weekend newspaper who have been protesting censorship.
lead_paragraph: People across China have been detained or questioned in recent days for supporting journalists at a newspaper who have been protesting strict censorship, according to a rights group and online posts.

headline.main: China Said to Crack Down on Censorship Protests
headline.print_headline:
China: Supporters of Journalists Say
They Have Come Under Scrutiny

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
